mapper.insert: insert into fk (id, rolename, version_role, version_file, operation, tag, cipher_fk) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{versionFile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cipherFk,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update fk set rolename = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_role = #{versionRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version_file = #{versionFile,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operation = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cipher_fk = #{cipherFk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, rolename, version_role, version_file, operation, tag, cipher_fk from fk
